languages.text: "На Футфоле на многое закрывают глаза, но даже местная публика не настолько неразборчива, чтоб чествовать пиратскую сволочь в двух шагах от резиденции Наместника. Но о Дензе столько десятков лет не было слышно... Я вот и сам его едва узнал, хотя в свое время видел на пиктах неоднократно. Полагаю, он отошел от дел и зажил более или менее честной жизнью под новым именем. Как его там назвали? Господин Беллардо?"

"Folks on Footfall are known to turn a blind eye to many things, but even the locals aren't so unscrupulous as to honour pirate scum a few paces away from the Liege's residence. But no one has heard of Denz for so many decades... I barely recognised him myself, and I've seen his face on picts a fair few times back then. I assume he retired and started a more or less honest life under a new name. What was it they were calling him? Master Bellardo?"
languages.original_text: "На Футфоле на многое закрывают глаза, но даже местная публика не настолько неразборчива, чтоб чествовать пиратскую сволочь в двух шагах от резиденции Наместника. Но о Дензе столько десятков лет не было слышно... Я вот и сам его едва узнал, хотя в свое время видел на пиктах неоднократно. Полагаю, он отошел от дел и зажил более или менее честной жизнью под новым именем. Как его там назвали? Господин Беллардо?"

But nobody has heard of Denz for so many decades... I barely recognized him myself, despite having seen his face on picts on a few occasions back then. I assume he retired and started a more or less honest life under a new name. What was it they were calling him? Master Bellardo?"

But no one has heard of Denz for so many decades... I barely recognised him myself, and I've seen his face on picts a fair few times back then. I assume he retired and started a more or less honest life under a new name. What was it they were calling him? Master Bellardo?"

languages.text: “落脚港的人对很多事情都睁一只眼闭一只眼。不过就算是这里的人，也不至于肆无忌惮到在离总督官邸几步之遥的地方，公然为海盗这样的败类举行葬礼。不过，这几十年来，根本没人听说过丹兹的消息……我之前在视讯记录上见过他几次，但刚刚，就连我都差点没认出来他来。我猜他应该是金盆洗手了，取了个新的名字，或多或少地过上了勤恳踏实的日子。那些人刚刚是怎么称呼他的？贝拉多大师？”
languages.original_text: "Folks on Footfall are known to turn a blind eye to many things, but even the locals aren't so unscrupulous as to honour pirate scum a few paces away from the Liege's residence. But no one has heard of Denz for so many decades... I barely recognised him myself, and I've seen his face on picts a fair few times back then. I assume he retired and started a more or less honest life under a new name. What was it they were calling him? Master Bellardo?"

traits.locale_text: “落脚港的人对很多事情都睁一只眼闭一只眼。不过就算是这里的人，也不至于肆无忌惮到在离总督官邸几步之遥的地方，公然为海盗这样的败类举行葬礼。不过，这几十年来，根本没人听说过丹兹的消息……我之前在视讯记录上见过他几次，但刚刚，就连我都差点没认出来他来。我猜他应该是金盆洗手了，取了个新的名字，或多或少地过上了勤恳踏实的日子。那些人刚刚是怎么称呼他的？贝拉多大师？”

languages.text: «La gente de Paso suele ignorar muchas cosas, pero ni ellos son tan inmorales como para honrar a un vil pirata junto a la residencia del señor. Pero nadie sabe nada de Denz desde hace muchas décadas... yo apenas le he reconocido, a pesar de haber visto su rostro en muchas imágenes de la época. Supongo que se retiró para dedicarse a una vida más o menos honrada con otro nombre. ¿Cómo le llamaban? ¿Maestro Bellardo?».
languages.original_text: "Folks on Footfall are known to turn a blind eye to many things, but even the locals aren't so unscrupulous as to honour pirate scum a few paces away from the Liege's residence. But no one has heard of Denz for so many decades... I barely recognised him myself, and I've seen his face on picts a fair few times back then. I assume he retired and started a more or less honest life under a new name. What was it they were calling him? Master Bellardo?"

traits.locale_text: «La gente de Paso suele ignorar muchas cosas, pero ni ellos son tan inmorales como para honrar a un vil pirata junto a la residencia del señor. Pero nadie sabe nada de Denz desde hace muchas décadas... yo apenas le he reconocido, a pesar de haber visto su rostro en muchas imágenes de la época. Supongo que se retiró para dedicarse a una vida más o menos honrada con otro nombre. ¿Cómo le llamaban? ¿Maestro Bellardo?».

languages.text: 「フットフォールの人々はさまざまなことに目を瞑ることで知られていますが、地元の人々でさえ領主の住居から数歩離れた場所で海賊のろくでなしどもに敬意を払うほど不謹慎なことはありません。しかし、デンツの名前はここ何十年かは耳にしていない…当時は穴が開くほど彼の写真を見ていた我でさえも彼に気づかなかったほどです。海賊業を引退して、新たな名前で多少なりともまっとうな人生を歩み始めたものだと思っていました。確か彼のことを別の名前で呼んでいたような。マスター・ベラルドだったかな？」
languages.original_text: "Folks on Footfall are known to turn a blind eye to many things, but even the locals aren't so unscrupulous as to honour pirate scum a few paces away from the Liege's residence. But no one has heard of Denz for so many decades... I barely recognised him myself, and I've seen his face on picts a fair few times back then. I assume he retired and started a more or less honest life under a new name. What was it they were calling him? Master Bellardo?"

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールの人々はさまざまなことに目を瞑ることで知られていますが、地元の人々でさえ領主の住居から数歩離れた場所で海賊のろくでなしどもに敬意を払うほど不謹慎なことはありません。しかし、デンツの名前はここ何十年かは耳にしていない…当時は穴が開くほど彼の写真を見ていた我でさえも彼に気づかなかったほどです。海賊業を引退して、新たな名前で多少なりともまっとうな人生を歩み始めたものだと思っていました。確か彼のことを別の名前で呼んでいたような。マスター・ベラルドだったかな？」

languages.text: "Auf Footfall sind die Leute ans Wegschauen gewöhnt, aber nicht einmal die Einheimischen sind so kaltschnäuzig, dass sie Piratenabschaum nur wenige Schritte von der Residenz des Lehnsherren die letzte Ehre erweisen. Andererseits hat seit Jahrzehnten niemand etwas von Denz gehört ... Ich habe ihn selbst kaum erkannt, dabei habe ich sein Gesicht damals auf Vids häufiger gesehen. Ich nehme an, er hat sich zur Ruhe gesetzt und unter neuem Namen ein mehr oder weniger ehrliches Leben begonnen. Wie haben sie ihn noch gleich genannt? Meister Bellardo?"
languages.original_text: "Folks on Footfall are known to turn a blind eye to many things, but even the locals aren't so unscrupulous as to honour pirate scum a few paces away from the Liege's residence. But no one has heard of Denz for so many decades... I barely recognised him myself, and I've seen his face on picts a fair few times back then. I assume he retired and started a more or less honest life under a new name. What was it they were calling him? Master Bellardo?"

traits.locale_text: "Auf Footfall sind die Leute ans Wegschauen gewöhnt, aber nicht einmal die Einheimischen sind so kaltschnäuzig, dass sie Piratenabschaum nur wenige Schritte von der Residenz des Lehnsherren die letzte Ehre erweisen. Andererseits hat seit Jahrzehnten niemand etwas von Denz gehört ... Ich habe ihn selbst kaum erkannt, dabei habe ich sein Gesicht damals auf Vids häufiger gesehen. Ich nehme an, er hat sich zur Ruhe gesetzt und unter neuem Namen ein mehr oder weniger ehrliches Leben begonnen. Wie haben sie ihn noch gleich genannt? Meister Bellardo?"

languages.text: « Les habitants de Castel sont connus pour fermer les yeux quand ça les arrange, mais ils ne sont tout de même pas inconscients au point d'honorer un pirate à deux pas de la résidence du suzerain. Cela dit, voilà plusieurs décennies que Denz n'avait plus fait parler de lui... Je dois dire que j'ai moi-même eu de la peine à le reconnaître, alors que j'ai vu plus d'une pictocapture de lui à l'époque. Il a dû prendre sa retraite et changer de nom pour mener une vie honnête. Ou du moins, un peu plus honnête. Comment l'ont-ils appelé ? Maître Bellardo ? »
languages.original_text: "Folks on Footfall are known to turn a blind eye to many things, but even the locals aren't so unscrupulous as to honour pirate scum a few paces away from the Liege's residence. But no one has heard of Denz for so many decades... I barely recognised him myself, and I've seen his face on picts a fair few times back then. I assume he retired and started a more or less honest life under a new name. What was it they were calling him? Master Bellardo?"

traits.locale_text: « Les habitants de Castel sont connus pour fermer les yeux quand ça les arrange, mais ils ne sont tout de même pas inconscients au point d'honorer un pirate à deux pas de la résidence du suzerain. Cela dit, voilà plusieurs décennies que Denz n'avait plus fait parler de lui... Je dois dire que j'ai moi-même eu de la peine à le reconnaître, alors que j'ai vu plus d'une pictocapture de lui à l'époque. Il a dû prendre sa retraite et changer de nom pour mener une vie honnête. Ou du moins, un peu plus honnête. Comment l'ont-ils appelé ? Maître Bellardo ? »

languages.text: "Binliman'da yaşayanlar birçok şeyi görmezden gelmeleriyle bilinir lakin buranın sakinleri bile Emîr'in evine birkaç adım uzaklıkta, pislik bir korsana hürmetlerini sunacak kadar vicdansız değildir. Gelgelelim onlarca yıldır Denz'den haber alan yoktu. Yüzünü zamanında fotolarda bolca görmeme rağmen, ben bile zar zor tanıdım. Herhâlde emekliye ayrılıp yeni bir isimle kendine az buçuk dürüst bir hayat kurmuş. Ne diyorlardı ona? Üstat Bellardo mu?"
languages.original_text: "Folks on Footfall are known to turn a blind eye to many things, but even the locals aren't so unscrupulous as to honour pirate scum a few paces away from the Liege's residence. But no one has heard of Denz for so many decades... I barely recognised him myself, and I've seen his face on picts a fair few times back then. I assume he retired and started a more or less honest life under a new name. What was it they were calling him? Master Bellardo?"

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'da yaşayanlar birçok şeyi görmezden gelmeleriyle bilinir ama bölge sakinleri bile Emîr'in evine birkaç adım uzaklıkta yatan alçak korsana taziyelerini sunmaktan geri duracak kadar vicdansız değildir. Onlarca yıldır Denz'den haber alan yoktu. Yüzünü o zamanlar fotolarda çok kez görmüş olmama rağmen ben bile onu zar zor tanıdım. Emekli olup yeni bir isimle kendine dürüst sayılabilecek bir hayat kurduğunu tahmin ediyorum. Ne diyorlardı ona? Üstat Bellardo muydu?"
